00020 // construct matrix with 1 element
00021 template< class T >
00022 Matrix< T >::Matrix() {
00023         clear();
00024         std::vector< T > row;
00025         T element;
00026         row.push_back( element );
00027         push_back( row );
00028 }
00029 
00030 // construct square matrix
00031 template< class T >
00032 Matrix< T >::Matrix( const int& size ) {
00033         clear();
00034         for( int y = 0; y < size; y++ ) {
00035                 std::vector< T > row;
00036                 for( int x = 0; x < size; x++ ) {
00037                         T element = ( T )0;
00038                         if( x == y )
00039                                 element = ( T )1;
00040                         row.push_back( element );
00041                 }
00042                 push_back( row );
00043         }
00044 }
00045 
00046 // construct any size matrix
00047 template< class T >
00048 Matrix< T >::Matrix( const int& ySize, const int& xSize ) {
00049         clear();
00050         for( int y = 0; y < ySize; y++ ) {
00051                 std::vector< T > row;
00052                 for( int x = 0; x < xSize; x++ ) {
00053                         T element = ( T )0;
00054                         row.push_back( element );
00055                 }
00056                 push_back( row );
00057         }
00058 }

00060 // get a certain column
00061 template <class T>
00062 std::vector< T >
00063 Matrix< T >::getColumn( const int column ) const {
00064         std::vector< T > result;
00065         for( typename Matrix< T >::const_iterator i = begin(); i != end(); i++ )
00066                 result.push_back( (*i)[ column ] );
00067         return result;
00068 }

00070 // product of matrix and vector
00071 template< class T >
00072 std::vector< T > 
00073 Matrix< T >::operator*( const std::vector< T >& v ) const {
00074         typename std::vector< T > resultVector;
00075         if( v.size() != (*this)[0].size() ) {
00076                 std::cerr << "Matrix and vector sizes don't match";
00077                 exit( 1 );
00078         }
00079         
00080         for( typename Matrix< T >::const_iterator matrixRow = begin(); matrixRow != end(); matrixRow++ ) {
00081                 T resultElement = ( T )0;
00082                 typename std::vector< T >::const_iterator vectorElement = v.begin();
00083                 for( typename std::vector< T >::const_iterator matrixElement = matrixRow->begin(); matrixElement != matrixRow->end(); matrixElement++ ) {
00084                         resultElement += *matrixElement * *vectorElement;
00085                         vectorElement++;
00086                 }
00087                 resultVector.push_back( resultElement );
00088         }
00089         return resultVector;
00090 }
00091 
00092 // product of matrices
00093 template< class T >
00094 Matrix< T > 
00095 Matrix< T >::operator*( const Matrix< T >& otherMatrix ) const {
00096         Matrix< T > resultMatrix = otherMatrix;
00097         if( otherMatrix.size() != size() ) {
00098                 std::cerr << "Matrix sizes don't match";
00099                 exit( 1 );
00100         }
00101         
00102         for( unsigned int row = 0; row < size(); row++ ) 
00103         for( unsigned int col = 0; col < size(); col++ ) {
00104                 resultMatrix[ row ][ col ] = 0;;
00105                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < size(); i++ ) {
00106                         resultMatrix[ row ][ col ] += (*this)[ row ][ i ] * otherMatrix[ i ][ col ];
00107                 }
00108         }
00109 
00110         return resultMatrix;
00111 }
